To avoid hotkey conflicts you can use the key from Dynamic activation key in combination with the selected keys below to activate them.
Double check for clipping issues when an armor is equipped.
Automatically mark armor on female characters to revealing if they have an item equipped on slot 52. Note that if armor is shared between men and women, it would aslo become revealing for men.
Automatically mark armor on male characters to revealing if they have an item equipped on slot 52. Note that if armor is shared between men and women, it would aslo become revealing for women.
Show or hide notifications on the hud.
Leave player size to be modified in the race menu using the XP32 racemenu addon.
Move the genital up or down. If there is an NPC with genital under the cursor it would move the NPC's genital, otherwise the player's.
Customize player or NPCs addon and size. If there is an NPC under cursor it would customize the NPC, otherwise it would customize the player.

Changes the size category multiplier. Each actor gets a size category randomly and can be customized using the customization key. Their final genital size would be: (their race multiplier) * (their size category)
The default addon for the race. Every character in this race would receive the default genital by default but can be customized using the customization keyword.

Changes the race multiplier. Each actor gets a size category randomly and can be customized using the customization key. Their final genital size would be: (their race multiplier) * (their size category)
The chance that women receive any of the selected addons below.
Wheter to distribute this addon to NPCs. All addons are always available in customization menu.
The level of the information that is logged. Don't change it unless you think that is necessary!
Default behavior to treat the conflicting mods.
Set behavior to neglect conflict(unchecked) or to treat the mod as a revealing mod(checked).
